label: Gifts and Presents
description: A market category encompassing search queries related to buying gifts and presents for various occasions.
intents: Find a gift for a specific person or occasion
Get ideas for gifts and presents
Find gifts within a specific budget

subcategories.label: Personalized Gifts
subcategories.description: Gifts that are customized or personalized for the recipient.

subcategories.label: Gifts for Specific Occasions
subcategories.description: Gifts that are appropriate for specific occasions such as birthdays, weddings, and graduations.

subcategories.label: Gifts by Recipient
subcategories.description: Gifts that are appropriate for specific recipients such as mothers, fathers, and friends.

subcategories.label: Gifts by Interest
subcategories.description: Gifts that are appropriate for people with specific interests such as gamers, book lovers, and travelers.

subcategories.label: Gift Cards and Vouchers
subcategories.description: Gift cards and vouchers that can be used to purchase items or experiences.
